roleset.name: project a shadow or contour against a background

role.descr: background against which the silhouette is seen

roles.note: Sometimes the lightsource can be the background-- pay attention to the syntax to distinguish Arg-0 from Arg-2

example.name: Passive with agent
example.text: The last I saw as I laid my head upon soft cushions on a down pallet was Joscelin-1 silhouetted *trace*-1 by lamplight

example.name: Passive with background
example.text: He was standing now with [his heavy chin]-1 silhouetted *trace*-1 against the flickering light of the candle on the table.
example.arg: against the flickering light of the candle on the table.

roleset.note: Roleset added by Julia based on example in Brown corpus. No Vncls.
